summary: The brains of a Russian taxi driver and a wealthy businessman are brought together in one body by a mad scientist.
cast: Bruce Campbell|Tamara Gorski|Ted Raimi|Antoinette Byron|Stacy Keach|Vladimir Kolev|Valentin Giasbeily|Velizar Binev|Raicho Vasilev|Jonas Talkington|Michail Elenov|Neda Sokolovska|Remington Franklin|Velimir Velev|Todor Nikolov|Yuri Safchev
title: Man with the Screaming Brain
